definition: pool/pond/(of metals etc) luster/favor or beneficence/damp/moist
"water" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 85), occurring in 没, 法, 流 etc/see also 三點水|三点水[san1 dian3 shui3]
Jiang Zemin (1926-), politician, president of PRC 1993-2003
Guangze county in Nanping 南平[Nan2 ping2] Fujian
Guangze county in Nanping 南平[Nan2 ping2] Fujian
Richard Li (1966-), Hong Kong businessman and philanthropist

sentences.english: Jialize wetland is one typical marsh in the middle area of Yunnan province.
sentences.chinese: 嵩明縣的嘉麗澤溼地是滇中典型的沼澤溼地。

sentences.english: Medium-bodied in deep ruby red color.
sentences.chinese: 中度酒體葡萄酒，呈深寶石紅色澤。

sentences.english: And the small mangrove forests left the camp to identify reactive nakamura.
sentences.chinese: 營左押着小林澤前來指認中村功。

sentences.english: Three sisters grow up on a chicken farm in a small town of Gifu.
sentences.chinese: 澤田家在岐阜縣經營養雞場，家裏有三個姐妹花。

sentences.english: Medium full-bodied dry red wine in dark ruby color.
sentences.chinese: 中度至豐滿酒體乾紅葡萄酒，深寶石紅色澤。

sentences.english: Executor, Zeratul shall find us passage to the warp gate.
sentences.chinese: 執行長，澤拉圖會殺出一條通往傳送門的血路。

sentences.english: Tasting Note: Medium-bodied red wine in deep red color.
sentences.chinese: 中度酒體乾紅葡萄酒，深寶紅色澤。

sentences.english: Brilliant, straw-yellow color with light green hints.
sentences.chinese: 明亮的稻黃色酒體泛着淡綠色澤。

sentences.english: The Jersey Shore situation differs a bit.
sentences.chinese: 澤西海岸的情況有一點不同。

sentences.english: Full-bodied dry red wine in deep ruby red color.
sentences.chinese: 酒體豐滿甘紅葡萄酒，深寶石紅色澤。

sentences.english: Yea, so is Snooky from Jersey Shore.
sentences.chinese: 對對，《澤西海岸》中的斯努基也是。

sentences.english: Yang the sworn brother Ze's singing sound is transmitting the plateau infinite character and style.
sentences.chinese: 央金蘭澤的歌聲傳遞着高原的無限風情。

sentences.english: Of all the Biblical names the most interesting is Ebenezer.
sentences.chinese: 在這些取自《聖經》的名中，最有趣的是埃比尼澤。

sentences.english: The Rize doesn't care if you push giant gears or spin your brains out.
sentences.chinese: 的裏澤不關心，如果你把巨型齒輪或自旋你的大腦了。

sentences.english: But in the meantime Zenit (St Petersburg) people are living in a dream world.
sentences.chinese: 但是此刻澤尼特的人正活在一個夢幻世界裏。

definition: worthy or virtuous person/honorific used for a person of the same or a younger generation
Mt Hua 華山|华山 in Shaanxi/surname Hua
to gallop/to assist/to attack/to wade/great/old variant of 憑|凭[ping2]
surname Wu/area comprising southern Jiangsu, northern Zhejiang and Shanghai/name of states in Southern China at different historical periods
(bound form) crass/stupid/rude/(used to represent the sounds of "ru", "lu" etc in loanwords)
surname Lu/Lu, ancient state of China 魯國|鲁国[Lu3 guo2]/Lu, short name for Shandong 山東|山东[Shan1 dong1]
surname Wei/vassal state during the Zhou Dynasty (1066-221 BC), located in present day Henan and Hebei Provinces
to guard/to protect/to defend/abbr. for 衛生|卫生, hygiene/health/abbr. for 衛生間|卫生间, toilet
